Detailed Description

creates information on a set of Vector3d

Author:
Sven Kurras 1. create an instance of this class 2. configure it by a ||-combination of the various bitflags that are given as static ints in the class. Pass the configuration to the constructor or to set_cfg(...)-function. 3. call handle(...) on a vector of Vector3d to analyse. The currently configured information will now become (re)calculated. 4. read out the information by the respective getter-function or get an overview of all configured information by the to_string()-function. 5. continue with any of the points above.

Definition at line 23 of file vecset_stats.h.

Member Function Documentation

void VecSetStats::handle ( const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr< Vector3d > > &  data  ) 

Calculates all information on all the Vector3D in this std::vector that is requested by the currently set flags. Access the individual information via the respective getter-function, or all combined as a string via the to_string()-function.

Parameters:
data the vectorial data to analyse
